page.title: 02AN ORDINARY DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: It is 7a.m. on Friday May 19th 1985 and my mum has just wakened me up. I was quite tired so I had just five more minutes in bed.My younger brother Matthew is still fast asleep.Without waking him I get out of bed and get dressed and get my training shoes and shorts ready for school. When I get downstairs Igo to the toilet and then get washed.It is difficult to get the toothpaste out of the tube because there is not much left. I go into the kitchen to see mum.She asks me to feed the bantams and stoke the boiler.When I have done these jobs,breakfast is ready and Matthew starts to emerge from the bedroom in his pyjamas.We have breakfast and the time is about 8a.m. Now I go upstairs to make my bed and get my things ready for school.
